options.content:
# 📊 Hinweis

- Durch nachträgliche Importe und Speicherung der Daten kann es im Vergleich mit anderen Stichtags-Erhebungen (z.B. den Berichten der Medienforschungen) Abweichungen bei den Daten geben.
- Dashboard-Anpassungen aufgrund von Änderungen bei Facebook: Aktive Nutzer und Interaktionen werden bis einschließlich März 2024 auf Page Ebene ausgewiesen, ab April 2024 wurden sie ersetzt durch die Werte auf Post Ebene.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

DECLARE profiles STRING;
SET profiles = ("$query1");
EXECUTE IMMEDIATE format("""WITH all_data AS(
SELECT DATE(jahr,monat,1) as month_year, REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'ä','ae'),'Ä','Ae'),'ö','oe'),'Ö','Oe'),'ü','ue'),'Ü','Ue'),'.',''),'!',''),'&',''),"'",""),'#',''),'🍀',''),'ß','ss') as profile, pot_reichweite_pro_tag as impressionsUnique FROM Quintly_frozen.facebook_metrics
WHERE LRA = "$LRA" AND 
CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 13 THEN jahr = $Jahr AND monat != 13
ELSE monat != 13 AND DATE(jahr,monat,1) BETWEEN DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1) END
ORDER BY month_year ASC),
max_date AS(
SELECT MAX(month_year) as max_datum FROM all_data
),
top_8_profiles_current_month AS(
SELECT profile FROM all_data
WHERE month_year = (SELECT max_datum FROM max_date)
ORDER BY impressionsUnique DESC
LIMIT 8
), top_8_profiles AS(
SELECT * FROM all_data
WHERE profile IN (SELECT profile FROM top_8_profiles_current_month)),
rest AS(
SELECT month_year, "Rest" as profile, SUM(impressionsUnique) as impressionsUnique
FROM all_data
WHERE profile NOT IN (SELECT profile FROM top_8_profiles_current_month)
GROUP BY month_year)
SELECT * FROM(
SELECT * FROM top_8_profiles
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM rest
ORDER BY month_year, profile)
PIVOT (
  SUM(impressionsUnique) FOR profile IN (%s)
)
ORDER BY DATE(month_year) ASC
""", profiles);

WITH top_8_profiles AS(
  SELECT profile, pot_reichweite_pro_tag as impressionsUnique
FROM Quintly_frozen.facebook_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA"
ORDER BY pot_reichweite_pro_tag DESC
LIMIT 8
), rest AS(
  SELECT "Rest" as profile, SUM(pot_reichweite_pro_tag) as impressionsUnique
FROM Quintly_frozen.facebook_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA"
AND profile NOT IN (SELECT profile FROM top_8_profiles)
)
SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'ä','ae'),'Ä','Ae'),'ö','oe'),'Ö','Oe'),'ü','ue'),'Ü','Ue'),'.',''),'!',''),'&',''),"'",""),'#',''),'🍀',''),'ß','ss') as profile,
impressionsUnique FROM(
SELECT profile, impressionsUnique FROM top_8_profiles
UNION ALL
SELECT profile, impressionsUnique FROM rest)

SELECT DATE(jahr,monat,1) as month, SUM(interactions)/1000000 as lm_interactions FROM Quintly_frozen.facebook_metrics
WHERE LRA = "$LRA" AND 
CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 13 THEN jahr = $Jahr AND monat != 13
ELSE monat != 13 AND DATE(jahr,monat,1) BETWEEN DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1) END
GROUP BY month
ORDER BY month ASC

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT SUM(reactions) AS Reaktionen, SUM(comments) AS Kommentare, SUM(shares) as Shares FROM Quintly_frozen.facebook_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number  AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA"

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Summe')), 'Summe')
FROM(
SELECT 'Summe' as Gesamt
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(Gesamt)), Gesamt)
FROM(
SELECT CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " ", $Jahr) as Gesamt
)

SELECT SUM(interactions)/1000000 as lm_interactions FROM Quintly_frozen.facebook_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA"

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(Gesamt)), Gesamt)
FROM(
SELECT CASE $month_as_number
            WHEN 13 THEN ""
            ELSE "$LastMonat_abkuerzung $YearFromLastMonth"
            END As Gesamt
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(Gesamt)), Gesamt)
FROM(
SELECT CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " ", $LastJahr) as Gesamt
)

WITH past_value_in_mil AS (
      SELECT SUM(interactions)/1000000 as past_sum_in_mil FROM Quintly_frozen.facebook_metrics
      WHERE monat = $month_from_last_year AND jahr = $last_year AND LRA = "$LRA"
    ),
    current_value_in_mil AS (
      SELECT SUM(interactions)/1000000 as current_sum_in_mil FROM Quintly_frozen.facebook_metrics
      WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA"
    )

    SELECT (current_sum_in_mil / past_sum_in_mil - 1) * 100 AS diff_mil, 
    FROM past_value_in_mil, current_value_in_mil

SELECT DATE(jahr,monat,1) as month, SUM(views_10s)/1000000 as videoViews10sMill FROM Quintly_frozen.facebook_metrics
WHERE LRA = "$LRA" AND 
CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 13 THEN jahr = $Jahr AND monat != 13
ELSE monat != 13 AND DATE(jahr,monat,1) BETWEEN DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1) END
GROUP BY month
ORDER BY month ASC

panels.title: Summe Videostarts (10 Sek.) $LRA Profile in Mio.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

WITH top_8_profiles AS(
  SELECT profile, views_10s as videoViews10s
FROM Quintly_frozen.facebook_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA"
ORDER BY videoViews10s DESC
LIMIT 8
), rest AS(
  SELECT "Rest" as profile, SUM(views_10s) as videoViews10s
FROM Quintly_frozen.facebook_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA"
AND profile NOT IN (SELECT profile FROM top_8_profiles)
)
SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'ä','ae'),'Ä','Ae'),'ö','oe'),'Ö','Oe'),'ü','ue'),'Ü','Ue'),'.',''),'!',''),'&',''),"'",""),'#',''),'🍀',''),'ß','ss') as profile,
videoViews10s FROM(
SELECT profile, videoViews10s FROM top_8_profiles
UNION ALL
SELECT profile, videoViews10s FROM rest)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Summe')), 'Summe')
FROM(
SELECT 'Summe' as Gesamt
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Ø Pro Tag')), 'Ø Pro Tag')
FROM(
SELECT 'Ø Pro Tag' as Gesamt
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(Gesamt)), Gesamt)
FROM(
SELECT CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " ", $Jahr) as Gesamt
)

SELECT SUM(views_10s)/1000000 as videoViews10sMill,  (SUM(views_10s)/1000000)/MAX(anzahltage) as videoViews10sMillPerDay FROM Quintly_frozen.facebook_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA"

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(Gesamt)), Gesamt)
FROM(
SELECT CASE $month_as_number
            WHEN 13 THEN ""
            ELSE "$LastMonat_abkuerzung $YearFromLastMonth"
            END As Gesamt
)

WITH past_value_in_mil AS (
  SELECT SUM(views_10s)/1000000 as past_sum_in_mil,  (SUM(views_10s)/1000000)/MAX(anzahltage) as past_sum_per_day FROM Quintly_frozen.facebook_metrics
WHERE monat = $last_month AND jahr = $year_from_last_month AND LRA = "$LRA"
), current_value_in_mil AS(
  SELECT SUM(views_10s)/1000000 as current_sum_in_mil,  (SUM(views_10s)/1000000)/MAX(anzahltage) as current_sum_per_day FROM Quintly_frozen.facebook_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA" AND monat != 13
)
SELECT (current_sum_in_mil/past_sum_in_mil - 1)*100 as diff_mil, (current_sum_per_day/past_sum_per_day - 1)*100 as diff_per_day FROM past_value_in_mil, current_value_in_mil

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(Gesamt)), Gesamt)
FROM(
SELECT CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " ", $LastJahr) as Gesamt
)

WITH past_value_in_mil AS (
  SELECT SUM(views_10s)/1000000 as past_sum_in_mil,  (SUM(views_10s)/1000000)/MAX(anzahltage) as past_sum_per_day FROM Quintly_frozen.facebook_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_from_last_year AND jahr = $last_year AND LRA = "$LRA"
), current_value_in_mil AS(
  SELECT SUM(views_10s)/1000000 as current_sum_in_mil,  (SUM(views_10s)/1000000)/MAX(anzahltage) as current_sum_per_day FROM Quintly_frozen.facebook_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA"
)
SELECT (current_sum_in_mil/past_sum_in_mil - 1)*100 as diff_mil, (current_sum_per_day/past_sum_per_day - 1)*100 as diff_per_day FROM past_value_in_mil, current_value_in_mil

SELECT
profile, pot_reichweite_pro_tag as impressions_unique_PerDay
FROM Quintly_frozen.facebook_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA"
ORDER BY impressions_unique_PerDay desc

SELECT
profile, pot_reichweite_pro_post as impressions_unique_PerDay
FROM Quintly_frozen.facebook_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA"
ORDER BY impressions_unique_PerDay desc

SELECT
profile, page_follows as followers
FROM Quintly_frozen.facebook_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA"
ORDER BY followers desc

SELECT 
lm.Profil,
(lm_follower/llm_follower - 1)*100 as FollowerVeraenderung
FROM
(SELECT
profile as Profil, page_follows as lm_follower
FROM Quintly_frozen.facebook_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA"
ORDER BY lm_follower desc) as lm
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT
profile as Profil, page_follows as llm_follower
FROM Quintly_frozen.facebook_metrics
WHERE LRA = "$LRA" AND 
CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 13 THEN monat = $month_from_last_year AND jahr = $last_year
ELSE monat = $last_month AND jahr = $year_from_last_month END
ORDER BY llm_follower desc) as llm ON llm.Profil = lm.Profil
ORDER BY lm.lm_follower DESC

SELECT profile as Profil, views_10s as videoViews10s FROM Quintly_frozen.facebook_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA"
ORDER BY videoViews10s DESC

SELECT profile as Profil, views_3s as videoViews3s FROM Quintly_frozen.facebook_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA"
ORDER BY videoViews3s DESC

SELECT profile as Profil, Sehvolumen FROM Quintly_frozen.facebook_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA"
ORDER BY Sehvolumen DESC

SELECT profile as Profil, COALESCE(interactions,0) as InteraktionenProPost FROM Quintly_frozen.facebook_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA"
ORDER BY InteraktionenProPost DESC

SELECT Profil, anzahlPosts FROM (
SELECT profile as Profil, COALESCE(interactions,0) as InteraktionenProPost, COALESCE(anzahlPosts,0) as anzahlPosts FROM Quintly_frozen.facebook_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA")
ORDER BY InteraktionenProPost DESC

options.content: Legende:  🖼️ = Bild    🎥 = Video    🔗 = Link    📕 = Album    📄 = Status

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
profile as Profil,
time as PostDatum,
message as Post,
link,
type as Typ,
interactions as Interaktionen,
pot_reichweite,
total_video_10s_views

FROM Quintly_frozen.top_posts_nach_interaktionen

WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA"
ORDER BY Interaktionen DESC
LIMIT 100

options.content: Legende:  🖼️ = Bild    🎥 = Video    🔗 = Link    📕 = Album    📄 = Status

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT DISTINCT
  profile,
  PostDatum,
  Post,
  link,
  Typ,
  Interaktionen,
  pot_reichweite,
  total_video_10s_views 
FROM Quintly_frozen.top_one_post_je_profil
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA"
ORDER BY Interaktionen DESC

WITH current_values AS(
SELECT profile, page_follows as current_followers, anzahlPosts as current_anzahlPosts, interactions as current_interactions, pot_reichweite_pro_tag as current_pot_reichweite_pro_tag, views_10s as current_views_10s, views_3s as current_views_3s,
pot_reichweite_pro_post as current_pot_reichweite_pro_post, sehVolumen as current_wiedergabendauer_in_std
FROM Quintly_frozen.facebook_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA"),
past_values AS(
SELECT profile, page_follows as past_followers, anzahlPosts as past_anzahlPosts, interactions as past_interactions, pot_reichweite_pro_tag as past_pot_reichweite_pro_tag, views_10s as past_views_10s, views_3s as past_views_3s,
pot_reichweite_pro_post as past_pot_reichweite_pro_post, sehVolumen as past_wiedergabendauer_in_std
FROM Quintly_frozen.facebook_metrics
WHERE CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 13 THEN monat = $month_from_last_year AND jahr = $last_year
ELSE monat = $last_month AND jahr = $year_from_last_month END
AND LRA = "$LRA"
), joined_data AS(
SELECT * FROM current_values
LEFT JOIN 
past_values
USING(profile))
SELECT profile as Profil,
current_followers as followers,
current_followers - past_followers as FollowerVeraenderungAbsolut,
(SAFE_DIVIDE(current_followers,past_followers)-1)*100 as FollowerVeraenderung,
current_anzahlPosts as Anzahlposts,
current_interactions as Interaktionen,
current_interactions - past_interactions as InteraktionenVeraenderungAbsolut,
(SAFE_DIVIDE(current_interactions,past_interactions)-1)*100 as InteraktionenVeraenderung,
current_pot_reichweite_pro_tag as PotenzielleReichweite,
current_pot_reichweite_pro_tag - past_pot_reichweite_pro_tag as PotenzielleReichweiteVeraenderungAbsolut,
(SAFE_DIVIDE(current_pot_reichweite_pro_tag,past_pot_reichweite_pro_tag)-1)*100 as PotenzielleReichweiteVeraenderung,
current_pot_reichweite_pro_post as PotenzielleReichweiteProPost,
current_pot_reichweite_pro_post - past_pot_reichweite_pro_post as PotenzielleReichweiteProPostVeraenderungAbsolut,
(SAFE_DIVIDE(current_pot_reichweite_pro_post,past_pot_reichweite_pro_post)-1)*100 as PotenzielleReichweiteProPostVeraenderung,
current_views_10s as videoViews10s,
current_views_10s - past_views_10s as videoViews10sVeraenderungAbsolut,
(SAFE_DIVIDE(current_views_10s,past_views_10s)-1)*100 as videoViews10sVeraenderung,
current_views_3s as videoViews3s,
current_views_3s - past_views_3s as videoViews3sVeraenderungAbsolut,
(SAFE_DIVIDE(current_views_3s,past_views_3s)-1)*100 as videoViews3sVeraenderung,
current_wiedergabendauer_in_std as sehVolumen,
current_wiedergabendauer_in_std - past_wiedergabendauer_in_std as sehVolumenVeraenderungAbsolut,
(SAFE_DIVIDE(current_wiedergabendauer_in_std,past_wiedergabendauer_in_std)-1)*100 as sehVolumenVeraenderung,
FROM joined_data
ORDER BY Profil DESC

query.rawSql:
SELECT a.LRA
FROM (
SELECT "MDR" as LRA
UNION DISTINCT
SELECT "NDR"
UNION DISTINCT
SELECT "KiKa"
) as a
ORDER BY (
  CASE
    WHEN REGEXP_CONTAINS(LOWER("${__user.email}"), LOWER(a.LRA))
    THEN 1
    ELSE 0
  END
) DESC

WITH all_months AS(
  SELECT "Januar" as monat, 1 as monat_num
  UNION ALL
  SELECT "Februar", 2
  UNION ALL
  SELECT "März", 3
  UNION ALL
  SELECT "April", 4
  UNION ALL
  SELECT "Mai", 5
  UNION ALL
  SELECT "Juni", 6
  UNION ALL
  SELECT "Juli", 7
  UNION ALL
  SELECT "August", 8
  UNION ALL
  SELECT "September", 9
  UNION ALL
  SELECT "Oktober", 10
  UNION ALL
  SELECT "November", 11
  UNION ALL
  SELECT "Dezember", 12
  UNION ALL
  SELECT "Jahr", 13
)
SELECT monat FROM all_months
WHERE CASE
-- Wenn ich ein abgeschlossenes Jahr wähle
WHEN CURRENT_DATE > DATE($Jahr+1,1,7) THEN TRUE

-- Wenn ich ein Jahr wähle, das kleiner als das aktuelle Jahr ist oder noch keinen abgeschlossenen Monat hat 
WHEN ((CURRENT_DATE BETWEEN DATE($Jahr,1,1) AND DATE($Jahr,1,7)) OR (EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE) <  $Jahr)) THEN FALSE

-- Wenn ich ein Jahr wähle mit einem abgeschlossenen letzten Monat
WHEN EXTRACT(DAY FROM CURRENT_DATE) > 7 THEN monat_num <= EXTRACT(MONTH from DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 MONTH))

-- Wenn ich ein Jahr wähle mit einem nicht abgeschlossenen letzten Monat
WHEN EXTRACT(DAY FROM CURRENT_DATE) <= 7 THEN monat_num <= EXTRACT(MONTH from DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 2 MONTH)) END

WITH all_data AS(
SELECT DATE(jahr,monat,1) as month_year, REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'ä','ae'),'Ä','Ae'),'ö','oe'),'Ö','Oe'),'ü','ue'),'Ü','Ue'),'.',''),'!',''),'&',''),"'",""),'#',''),'🍀',''),'ß','ss') as profile, pot_reichweite_pro_tag as impressionsUnique FROM Quintly_frozen.facebook_metrics
WHERE LRA = "$LRA" AND 
CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 13 THEN jahr = $Jahr AND monat != 13
ELSE monat != 13 AND DATE(jahr,monat,1) BETWEEN DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1) END
ORDER BY month_year ASC),
max_date AS(
SELECT MAX(month_year) as max_datum FROM all_data
),
top_8_profiles_current_month AS(
SELECT profile FROM all_data
WHERE month_year = (SELECT max_datum FROM max_date)
ORDER BY impressionsUnique DESC
LIMIT 8
), top_8_profiles_and_rest AS(
SELECT profile FROM top_8_profiles_current_month
UNION ALL
SELECT "Rest")
SELECT STRING_AGG(DISTINCT CONCAT("'", profile, "'"), ', ') FROM top_8_profiles_and_rest

SELECT
CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 1 THEN "Januar"
WHEN 2 THEN "Februar"
WHEN 3 THEN "März"
WHEN 4 THEN "April"
WHEN 5 THEN "Mai"
WHEN 6 THEN "Juni"
WHEN 7 THEN "Juli"
WHEN 8 THEN "August"
WHEN 9 THEN "September"
WHEN 10 THEN "Oktober"
WHEN 11 THEN "November"
WHEN 12 THEN "Dezember"
WHEN 13 THEN ""
END

SELECT
CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 1 THEN "Jan."
WHEN 2 THEN "Feb."
WHEN 3 THEN "März"
WHEN 4 THEN "Apr."
WHEN 5 THEN "Mai"
WHEN 6 THEN "Juni"
WHEN 7 THEN "Juli"
WHEN 8 THEN "Aug."
WHEN 9 THEN "Sep."
WHEN 10 THEN "Okt."
WHEN 11 THEN "Nov."
WHEN 12 THEN CASE "${Monat:text}" WHEN "Jahr" THEN "Jahr" ELSE "Dez." END
END

SELECT
CASE EXTRACT(MONTH from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))
WHEN 1 THEN "Jan."
WHEN 2 THEN "Feb."
WHEN 3 THEN "März"
WHEN 4 THEN "Apr."
WHEN 5 THEN "Mai"
WHEN 6 THEN "Juni"
WHEN 7 THEN "Juli"
WHEN 8 THEN "Aug."
WHEN 9 THEN "Sep."
WHEN 10 THEN "Okt."
WHEN 11 THEN "Nov."
WHEN 12 THEN "Dez."
WHEN 13 THEN ""
END
SELECT CAST($Jahr - 1 AS STRING)
SELECT CAST(EXTRACT(YEAR from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1),INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AS STRING)

current.text: EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = 9 AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = 2024
current.value: EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = 9 AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = 2024

query.rawSql:
SELECT 
    CASE "${Monat:text}"
    WHEN "Jahr" THEN "EXTRACT(YEAR FROM time) = $Jahr"
    ELSE "EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $month_as_number AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr"
    END

SELECT CASE "${Monat:text}"
      WHEN "Jahr" THEN "Vorjahr"
      ELSE "Vormonat "
      END
    as month_year

WITH max_time AS (SELECT MAX(time) as time FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${table_suffix}` as facebook
            WHERE $Zeitraum AND page_follows IS not null)
SELECT CONCAT(EXTRACT(DAY FROM time),".", EXTRACT(MONTH FROM time),".", EXTRACT(YEAR FROM time)) FROM max_time

SELECT
CASE 
WHEN ($month_as_number = 13 AND DATE($Jahr+1, 1, 7) > CURRENT_DATE()) THEN FORMAT_DATE('%d.%m.%Y', CURRENT_DATE())
WHEN $month_as_number = 13 THEN CONCAT("07.01.",CAST($Jahr+1 AS STRING))
WHEN DATE_ADD(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,7), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) > CURRENT_DATE() THEN FORMAT_DATE('%d.%m.%Y', CURRENT_DATE())
ELSE 
CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 12 THEN CONCAT("07.01.",CAST($Jahr+1 AS STRING))
ELSE CONCAT('07.', LPAD(CAST($month_as_number + 1 AS STRING), 2, '0'), '.', CAST($Jahr AS STRING))
END
END

SELECT
CASE
WHEN $month_as_number = 13 AND CURRENT_DATE() < DATE($Jahr + 1, 1, 7) THEN ""
WHEN $Jahr < 2021 THEN ""
WHEN $month_as_number = 13 AND CURRENT_DATE() > DATE($Jahr, 1, 7) THEN CONCAT("_final_",CAST($Jahr AS STRING))
WHEN CURRENT_DATE() < DATE_ADD(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,8),INTERVAL 1 MONTH) THEN ""
WHEN LAST_DAY(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1)) <= DATE(2023,12,31) THEN ""
ELSE CONCAT("_final_",CAST($Jahr AS STRING),"_", CAST($month_as_number AS STRING)) END

SELECT
CASE
WHEN $month_as_number = 13 AND CURRENT_DATE() < DATE($Jahr + 1, 1, 7) THEN ""
WHEN $Jahr < 2021 THEN ""
WHEN $month_as_number = 13 AND CURRENT_DATE() > DATE($Jahr, 1, 7) THEN "_frozen"
WHEN CURRENT_DATE() < DATE_ADD(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,8),INTERVAL 1 MONTH) THEN ""
WHEN LAST_DAY(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1)) <= DATE(2023,12,31) THEN "_frozen"
ELSE "_frozen" END
SELECT CAST(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $month_as_number, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AS STRING)
SELECT CAST(EXTRACT(YEAR FROM DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $month_as_number, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AS STRING)
SELECT CAST($Jahr-1 AS STRING)
SELECT CAST($month_as_number AS STRING)

SELECT CASE $month_as_number
            
            WHEN 13 THEN "##"
            ELSE "## $LastMonat_abkuerzung  \n ## $YearFromLastMonth"
            END

SELECT CAST(number AS STRING) FROM (
SELECT
CASE "$Monat"
WHEN "Januar" THEN 1
WHEN "Februar" THEN 2
WHEN "März" THEN 3
WHEN "April" THEN 4
WHEN "Mai" THEN 5
WHEN "Juni" THEN 6
WHEN "Juli" THEN 7
WHEN "August" THEN 8
WHEN "September" THEN 9
WHEN "Oktober" THEN 10
WHEN "November" THEN 11
WHEN "Dezember" THEN 12
WHEN "Jahr" THEN 13
END as number)
